title: Whatâ€™s News: World-Wide
body:
Western leaders vowed to investigate alleged war crimes in Ukraine and impose new penalties on Moscow over reports of Russian atrocities against Ukrainian civilians that have sparked international condemnation and outrage.
Jackson cleared a procedural hurdle on her way to all but certain confirmation to the Supreme Court, as three Republicans joined all 50 senators who caucus with the Democrats in voting to advance her nomination.
